nodes.text: The Zanbar Death Watch camp was a base established by the Mandalorian Death Watch on Zanbar during the Clone Wars, after relocating from Carlac.

Sometime after their disastrous duel on Florrum with Jedi Master Obi-Wan Kenobi, Darth Maul and Savage Opress were found near dead by the Death Watch in their escape pod. Pre Vizsla and Bo-Katan found them and took the two to their camp for medical treatment, where Maul received new cybernetic legs and Opress received a cybernetic left arm.. The two brothers would later ally with the Death Watch after seeing their aims were not so different.
It was at this camp that Lom Pyke and his allies approached Maul wishing to form an alliance with the Shadow Collective. Maul accepted, and the Pyke family joined their ranks.
